title: hash
description: Hash data using Minima's internal hash function (Keccak-256 / SHA3). LOCAL OPERATION ONLY — does not write to the blockchain, does not produce a txpowid. To create an on-chain record, use record_data.sh or the SDK recordOnChain() method instead.

hash.description: Hash result, 0x-prefixed hex string. This is a LOCAL computation — NOT an on-chain identifier. Cannot be looked up on the explorer.

x-agent-warnings: LOCAL OPERATION: hash does not write anything to the blockchain
The hash output is NOT a txpowid — it cannot be looked up on the explorer
To record data on-chain, use record_data.sh or SDK recordOnChain() instead
Explorer links use txpowid (from transactions), not hash output
Input can be a string or 0x-prefixed hex data
